desc.en: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.thai: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.ko: The forces are Kaiser PMC and they surround the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_tw: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围對策委員會，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 他们遇到的敌人就是凯萨PMC。为了包围对策委员会，PMC的兵力开始群涌而至。

desc.en: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.jp: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.thai: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.ko: None is known about neither the identity nor the intents of these people. Ayane suddenly finds out the there are signs of "Kaiser PMC (Private Military Company)" and everyone is shocked.
desc.zh_tw: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时綾音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 大家对这些人的归属与意图都不明。这时绫音突然发现建筑上有凯撒PMC（Private Military Company）的标志，众人吃了一惊。

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.thai: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.ko: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_tw: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.thai: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.ko: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
desc.zh_tw: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.thai: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.ko: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）
desc.zh_tw: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.
desc.jp: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.
desc.thai: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.
desc.ko: Ayane points out such military corporations, like PMC, are not the same as those gangsters like the Helmet Group. Nonomi suddenly remembers that there are some corporations hiring dropouts and bad students as mercenaries. It is at this time when everyone finds that more troops are coming to them.
desc.zh_tw: 綾音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野乃美突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野宫突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 绫音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野乃美突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 绫音指出PMC此类军事公司与头盔团那些小混混并不一样。野宫突然记起以前好像听说有企业雇佣退学的和不良学生为雇佣兵。这时众人突然发现大量兵力在朝他们涌来。
